# Install dependencies: dplyr, factoextra, FactoMineR, ggplot2, igraph, Matrix, SnowballC and, stringr 

```{r}
install.packages("dplyr", "factoextra", "FactoMineR", "ggplot2", "igraph", "Matrix", "rscopus", "SnowballC", "stringr")
```
# install stable version of bibliometrix from CRAN repository

```{r}
install.packages("bibliometrix")
```
